properties.entry:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT ASK_TITLE "TITLE" , ENROLL_DATE "ENROLL_DATE" , COUNT , MEM_NO , '궁금해요' "CATEGORY" FROM ASK JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = ASK_WRITER)
UNION
SELECT PNAME , ENROLL_DATE , COUNT , MEM_NO , '찾고있어요' FROM TB_MISSING JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = MISSING_WRITER)
UNION
SELECT MARKET_TITLE , ENROLL_DATE , COUNT , MEM_NO , '중고거래' FROM MARKET JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = MARKET_WRITER)
UNION
SELECT PINQUIRY_TITLE , PINQUIRY_DATE , COUNT , MEM_NO , '상품문의' FROM TB_PINQUIRY JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO)
UNION
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , REVIEW_DATE , COUNT , MEM_NO , '상품리뷰' FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO)
UNION
SELECT QNA_TITLE , QNA_DATE , COUNT , MEM_NO , 'QnA' FROM TB_QNA JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) ) WHERE MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
